a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Primary, secondary and tertiary education enrolment and completion
This is given as the gross rate, which includes children of any age entering the level of education; this can result in
percentages greater than 100 because children may enter education late or repeat a year.
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2024)
